invariant_solvency().details: Solvency check: contract balance should always be >= collected fees

invariant_ownerSet().notice: Invariant: Owner should always be set and valid

invariant_poolSet().notice: Invariant: Pool address should always be set for AAVE

 @dev Solvency check: contract balance should always be >= collected fees
